Package marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager.Main
  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class of the application. Interprets the input commands and runs the server, the driver or the control panel.
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    marcocipriani01
